mapper.select: SELECT b3.cate_sn cate_sn_1, b3.cate_nm lev_1 , b2.cate_sn cate_sn_2, b2.cate_nm lev_2,b.data_date data_date ,sum(b.data_exha_val) data_val FROM comt_cbntr_product a JOIN comt_cbntr_data b ON a.prdt_sn = b.prdt_sn JOIN comt_cbntr_category c ON a.cate_sn = c.cate_sn JOIN comt_cbntr_category b2 ON b2.cate_sn = c.cate_upr_sn JOIN comt_cbntr_category b3 ON b3.cate_sn = b2.cate_upr_sn WHERE b3.cate_sn = 1 GROUP BY b.data_date, b2.cate_sn, b3.cate_sn

SELECT b3.cate_sn cate_sn_1, b3.cate_nm lev_1, b2.cate_sn cate_sn_2, b2.cate_nm lev_2, c.cate_sn cate_sn_3, c.cate_nm lev_3, b.data_date data_date, sum(b.data_exha_val) data_val FROM comt_cbntr_product a JOIN comt_cbntr_data b ON a.prdt_sn = b.prdt_sn JOIN comt_cbntr_category c ON a.cate_sn = c.cate_sn JOIN comt_cbntr_category b2 ON b2.cate_sn = c.cate_upr_sn JOIN comt_cbntr_category b3 ON b3.cate_sn = b2.cate_upr_sn WHERE b3.cate_sn = 1 GROUP BY b.data_date, b2.cate_sn, b3.cate_sn, c.cate_sn ORDER BY c.cate_sn ASC

SELECT b3.cate_sn cate_sn_1, b3.cate_nm lev_1, b2.cate_sn cate_sn_2, b2.cate_nm lev_2, c.cate_sn cate_sn_3, c.cate_nm lev_3, a.prdt_sn, a.prdt_nm, b.data_date data_date, b.data_exha_val data_val FROM comt_cbntr_product a JOIN comt_cbntr_data b ON a.prdt_sn = b.prdt_sn JOIN comt_cbntr_category c ON a.cate_sn = c.cate_sn JOIN comt_cbntr_category b2 ON b2.cate_sn = c.cate_upr_sn JOIN comt_cbntr_category b3 ON b3.cate_sn = b2.cate_upr_sn WHERE b3.cate_sn = 14 AND b.data_date = #{low_date} ORDER BY a.prdt_sn ASC

SELECT distinct a.prdt_sn prdt_sn, a.prdt_nm prdt_nm FROM comt_cbntr_product a JOIN comt_cbntr_data b ON a.prdt_sn = b.prdt_sn JOIN comt_cbntr_category c ON a.cate_sn = c.cate_sn JOIN comt_cbntr_category b2 ON b2.cate_sn = c.cate_upr_sn JOIN comt_cbntr_category b3 ON b3.cate_sn = b2.cate_upr_sn WHERE b3.cate_sn = 14 ORDER BY a.prdt_sn ASC

SELECT distinct c.cate_nm, c.cate_sn FROM comt_cbntr_product a JOIN comt_cbntr_data b ON a.prdt_sn = b.prdt_sn JOIN comt_cbntr_category c ON a.cate_sn = c.cate_sn JOIN comt_cbntr_category b2 ON b2.cate_sn = c.cate_upr_sn JOIN comt_cbntr_category b3 ON b3.cate_sn = b2.cate_upr_sn WHERE b3.cate_sn = 1 ORDER BY c.cate_sn ASC
